This property verifies that the register rFF is correctly reset to 0 one clock cycle after the active-high reset signal Rst is asserted. 

Specifically, whenever Rst becomes 1 at a positive edge of the Clk, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle (one Clk cycle later), the signal rFF must be 0. The property is disabled and not checked when Rst is 0.
